isEmail: The field must be an email address
isInt: The field must be an integer
minLength: The field must be at least {constraint} characters
maxLength: The field must be at most {constraint} characters
matches: The field does not conform to the required format
isUrl: The field is not in the form of a URL
isPhoneNumber: The field is not in the form of a phone number
notStructureToken: Token does not have the correct structure

sentVerification: Check your email and enter the code sent
messageHaveQuestion: If you have any questions or complaints, please don't hesitate to contact us.
activateAccount: Your account has been successfully activated.
recoverySent: Help is on the way, we've sent you an email.
newAccess: Click the button below to generate a new password:
messageExpiration: This link expired in 24 hours. If you did not request a password reset, you can ignore this message.
messageRecomendation: For security reasons, please do not share the link with anyone when you select the reset button. Our team will never ask for your password.
passwordChange: The password has been updated successfully.
tokenUsed: The token has already been used
rateLimit: The allowed limit has been exceeded.
